title: Science Subject Learning Design Workshop for Responding to Remote Education in the Pandemic Era

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and offline teaching experience
context.additional_context: A practice-centered workshop to respond to the sudden shift to remote education during the COVID-19 pandemic. Experiencing blended (online/offline) learning design while maintaining a project-based assessment system.

learning_goals: Learners can propose three or more remote education lesson designs reflecting the characteristics of science subjects.
Learners can establish personalized assessment plans considering students' BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments and learning levels.
Learners can practice converting offline learning materials into remote education content while utilizing over 80% of existing resources.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
